# ARIIA – Enterprise AI Agent Platform

> ARIIA is a Multi-Tenant Enterprise AI Agent Platform that automates customer communication across WhatsApp, Telegram, SMS, and Voice using Multi-Agent Orchestration and Swarm Intelligence. GDPR-compliant. Made in Germany.

ARIIA provides intelligent AI agents that handle customer interactions autonomously across multiple channels. The platform uses a swarm architecture where specialized agents (Sales, Support, Operations) collaborate to resolve every customer request. ARIIA serves businesses of all sizes and industries – from startups to enterprise organizations with multiple locations.

## Key Features

- **Multi-Agent Orchestration**: Specialized AI agents work together in a swarm to handle complex customer interactions
- **Omnichannel Communication**: WhatsApp Business, Telegram, Voice AI, SMS, Web Widget
- **3-Tier Memory System**: Short-term, long-term, and contextual memory for personalized interactions
- **Vision AI**: Image analysis for product recognition and visual support
- **CRM Integration**: Seamless connection to HubSpot, Salesforce, Shopify, and more
- **Real-time Analytics**: Dashboard with KPIs, ticket tracking, and confidence scores
- **Knowledge Base**: Central knowledge management for AI agents
- **Contact Memory**: Individual customer profiles with preferences and history
- **Campaign Management**: Automated marketing campaigns across all channels
- **Escalation Management**: Automatic handoff to human agents when needed
- **Multi-Tenant Architecture**: Manage multiple locations or departments from one account
- **GDPR Compliance**: All data hosted in ISO-certified data centers in Germany
